S:log-item.D:comment: DERBY-498 - Result set holdability defined inside stored procedures is ignored by server/client merge from trunk svn merge -r 326717:326718 https://svn.apache.org/repos/asf/db/derby/code/trunk Contributed by Deepa Remesh Note the test lang/holdCursorJava.java does not currently run with derbynetmats or derbynetclientmats.
